meanings.definition: A person regarded as an inspired teacher or proclaimer of the will of God.
meanings.sent1: The village elder was seen as a wise prophet by all.
meanings.sent2: The prophet spoke of peace and harmony among all people.
meanings.sent3: The prophet's prediction of a sunny day made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like those of a prophet, guiding us through troubled times.
meanings.sent5: The prophet's message of love resonated with the hearts of many.

meanings.definition: A person who predicts or foretells what will happen in the future.
meanings.sent1: The weather prophet said it would rain tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The prophet's visions often came true, astonishing many.
meanings.sent3: The prophet's forecast of a snowstorm led to a rush for supplies.
meanings.sent4: His accuracy in predicting events earned him the title of prophet.
meanings.sent5: The prophet's words seemed to unveil the mysteries of time itself.
